era.name: Anchor Year 1670 CE
era.summary: Science claws at scripture, gunpowder spreads like rumor, and the Veil presses close. The Breathbound fracture, elves fail to cleanse their rot, dwarves drain the living for iron-seals, ogres gather under a child-minded tyrant, and cults raise pylons to retune the sky.
era.theme: Scripture vs Enlightenment; Faith splintered under Veil pressure

tech_level.humans: matchlocks common, early flintlocks emerging; pike & shot doctrine uneven
tech_level.dwarves: reliable rifling; early repeaters rumored; heavy artillery with rune-baffling
tech_level.elves: no gunpowder; master bows, alchemic resins, ritual armor
tech_level.ogres: improvised siege clubs, stolen cannons as hand-guns

world_state.humans: Breathbound Orders peak yet fracturing (Crusader zeal vs Confessor reform). Relic markets thrive; heresy trials rise. Peasant unrest simmers.
world_state.elves: Echelon of Thorns in crisis; sacrifices fail to fully offload corruption. Radicals push to embrace the Veil; moderates seek a lost Shard linked to the First Temptation.
world_state.dwarves: Iron Wards rush a continent Grand Seal; Soul Crucible fuel dwindles. Night raids target bodies/essence; some holds falter under rift incursions.
world_state.ogres: Vat-rumors true: a child-minded tyrant gathers a horde. Tale says he dreams in the Veil’s voice.
world_state.veil: Rift-lights haunt the sky; crops rot overnight. Reclaimers of Va erect hidden pylons; three active pylons may split the sky.

mechanics.breath_contextual_bonus: Breath boons auto-activate vs abominations/veil phenomena; disabled by sinful state flags.

factions_in_motion: Breathbound: Crusaders plan purges; Confessors negotiate reforms.
Echelon of Thorns: schism crisis; child-steal hunts escalate.
Iron Wards: desperate for fuel; brokering guns to anyone with bodies.
Reclaimers of Va: three-pylon aperture attempt underway.
Khilafate of the Scoured Veil: desert conquests baptized as ‘cleansings’.

regions.name: Cinderhold
regions.notes: Relic markets thrive in soot-choked alleys. Some Orders call gunpowder profane; others bless barrels with Breath.

regions.name: Thornskull
regions.notes: Echelon of Thorns cannot offload corruption as before. A radical coterie whispers: 'Embrace the Veil fully.'

regions.name: Ironcrag
regions.notes: Rifled muskets and runic cannon boom, but every advance costs lives poured into the Crucible.

regions.name: Gearwomb
regions.notes: An ogre warlord with a child's mind and a tyrant's will follows dreams that are not his own.

regions.name: Ashen Coast
regions.notes: Veil-storms ruin crops overnight. Villages whisper of 'mercy sacrifices'.

regions.name: Veilwoods Rim
regions.notes: Not stars but Veil-lights drift between trees; trackers return with words wrong-shaped.

omens: Blood-moon over Cinderhold for three nights; tides refuse the shore.
Ironcrag’s western rune-tower hums without scribe or steam.
In Thornskull, sap runs black and sings beneath the bark.
Dreams of a broken stair spread city to steppe; each dream ends at a door that does not open.

schisms: Crusader Chapters demand public purges of Veil-users.
Confessors argue for hidden rescues and quiet reform.
Grey Friars trade relics to buy orphans out of elven hunts.
operations_1670: Seal a rumored mass-sacrifice in Cinderhold’s old amphitheater.
Smuggle Breath-touched children onto pilgrim ships.

crises: Sacrifices fail to take full corruption; elites sicken behind silks.
A sect seeks the First Thorn, said to be Eve’s temptation given form.
operations_1670: Shadow hunts in the Ashen Coast targeting shrine-keepers.
Deal with Reclaimers for shard maps, then murder the surveyors.

projects: The Grand Seal: a continent-spanning lattice tying rune obelisks to soul-forges.
Prototype repeating firelocks for tunnel fighting.
operations_1670: Night-raids to harvest 'fuel' from debtor prisons.
Hire human mercenaries to test a portable seal-engine.

tides: Full-moon drownings return fish to dead rivers.
Swamp altars trade brine charms for firstborn names.
operations_1670: Call a fog that never lifts over a coastal parish.
Grow barnacled undead to raid relic boats.

works: Three Va-Pylons sited on leylines beneath Cinderhold, the Veilwoods Rim, and a salt flat.
Living Breath 'counterweights' chained in hidden vaults.
operations_1670: Activate two pylons to thin the sky; open the third for a vault door no one else can see.

faction_activity.doctrine: Suffering is the furnace, conquest the prayer.
operations_1670: Desert raids deliver branded captives to brass altars.
Emir Zulfiqar seeks a shard said to make sand itself obey.

flashpoints.name: The Cinderhold Veil-Storm
hooks: Retune a pylon to reveal an Eldran vault

flashpoints.name: The Ironcrag Fuel Riots
flashpoints.stakes: Civil revolt vs. Veil breach in the mines
hooks: Protect or sabotage the Grand Seal

flashpoints.name: Hunt of the First Thorn
hooks: Bargain with Drowned Daughters for passage
